src:
Butuh Penyerang Baru, MU Pertimbangkan Rekrut Richarlison
07 Nov 2019, 19:40 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Manchester United diberitakan memiliki target transfer baru untuk lini serang mereka. Setan Merah disebut tertarik merekrut Richarlison dari Everton.
Sudah menjadi rahasia umum jika United tengah mengincar penyerang baru. Mereka diberitakan ingin mencari pengganti Romelu Lukaku yang pindah ke Inter Milan di musim panas ini.
Ada banyak penyerang elit yang dikaitkan dengan Manchester United. Ada nama Mario Mandzukic, Erling Braut Haaland dan Timo Werner yang diyakini menjadi buruan Setan Merah.
London Evening Standard mengklaim bahwa Solskjaer kini punya buruan baru. Ia tertarik membeli Richarlison dari Everton.

Apa yang membuat Solskjaer tertarik dengan Richarlison? Simak informasinya di bawah ini.
text:
Need a New Attacker, MU Consider Recruitment Richarlison
Nov 7 2019, 19:40 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Manchester United is reported to have a new transfer target for their attack line. Red Devils are said to be interested in recruiting Richarlison from Everton.
It is common knowledge that United are eyeing a new striker. They reportedly wanted to find a replacement for Romelu Lukaku who moved to Inter Milan this summer.
There are many elite attackers associated with Manchester United. There are names Mario Mandzukic, Erling Braut Haaland and Timo Werner who are believed to be hunted by the Red Devils.
The London Evening Standard claims that Solskjaer now has a new game. He was interested in buying Richarlison from Everton.

What made Solskjaer interested in Richarlison? Check out the information below.
